mapper.select: select count(parentType) typeCount,parentType from message where isRead=0 and toUserId=#{toUserId} group by parentType order by parentType
select DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createTime from message where parentType=#{parentType} and toUserId=#{toUserId} order by id desc limit 1
select DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createTime from awardInfo order by id desc limit 1

select id msgId,'' as icon,4 as parentType,0 as childType,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createTime, '开奖消息' as title,'' as picture,taskTitle as content,'' as bottomText,1 as urlType,CONCAT(#{toUrl},id)as toUrl,1 as isRead from awardInfo where id<=${startMsgId} order by id desc limit 10

select id msgId,icon,parentType,childType,DATE_FORMAT(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createTime,title,picture,content,bottomText,urlType,toUrl,isRead from message where parentType=#{msgType} and id<=${startMsgId} and toUserId=#{toUserId}
AND isRead=0
AND isRead=1
order by id desc limit 10
